name: Some Dumb Boomerang Game - 20 Second Jam
name_original: Some Dumb Boomerang Game - 20 Second Jam
description:
This was made for the 20 Second Game Jam (https://itch.io/jam/20-second-game-jam) in November 2022. 

This was a great distraction from the main project I've been working on, and though there are many things I would want to change/include I'm happy with the entry after 12ish hours of work.

Let me know what highscore you get in the comments!
